document_type: Final Determination Notification and Payroll Records
security: The text is redacted because the public disclosure of the redaction could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, and that invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest.
summary: This document is a Final Determination Notification from the Assassination Records Review Board regarding HSCA staff payroll records, specifically detailing the postponement of Social Security numbers to protect personal privacy, along with associated payroll authorization forms and memoranda related to the employment of Margo E. Jackson.
summary_one_paragraph: This document includes a Final Determination Notification from the Assassination Records Review Board concerning HSCA staff payroll records, citing the postponement of Social Security numbers to protect personal privacy. It also encompasses payroll authorization forms and memoranda, predominantly focusing on the employment history of Margo E. Jackson within the HSCA, documenting her appointments, salary adjustments, and position as a Document Clerk from June 1977 to December 1978, authorized by Louis Stokes.
title: Final Determination Notification: HSCA Staff Payroll Records Regarding Margo E. Jackson
recipient: Clerk of the House of Representatives, All Staff
sender: HSCA, Steve Fallis, Donovan L. Gay
